metadata.title: CVE-2016-3866 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Qualcomm sound driver in Android before 2016-09-05 on Nexus 5X, 6, and6P devices allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application,aka Android internal bug 28868303 and Qualcomm internal bug CR1032820.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.

linux-lts-wily: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
